name: DP77s-Better-Basic-Craftings
title: DP77s Better Basic Craftings
author: Dyego
description: Add advanced researches for Copper Cable and Iron Gear with the ability to craft them at 50%, 100%, 200% and 300% discount on plates. Example: if you have researched Advanced Iron Gear Processing 4, you can make 6 Iron Gear from 1 Iron Plate!
